## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

M22 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$30.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m22-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M22 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$30.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- M22 X 2.0 X 1D
- M22 X 2.0 X 1.5D
- M22 X 2.0 X 2D
- M22 X 2.0 X 2.5D
- M22 X 2.0 X 3D

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

M2.2 0.45 BaerCoil Insert (Helicoil Type)


From **$17.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m2-2-0-45-baercoil-insert-helicoil#variants)

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/free_shipping_icon_medium.png?1283)

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

# **Got a Question?** **Call 01-4730900**

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M2.2 0.45 BaerCoil Insert (Helicoil Type)

From **$17.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/free_shipping_icon_medium.png?1283)

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m2-2-0-45-baercoil-insert-helicoil)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

From **$8.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m2-5-x-0-45-baercoil-inserts-helicoil)

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_3.jpeg?v=1345571944&width=88)

M3 X 0.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type))


From **$9.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m3-x-0-5-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M3 X 0.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type))

From **$9.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Lenght

- Default
- M3 X 0.5 X 1D
- M3 X 0.5 X 1.5D
- M3 X 0.5 X 2D
- M3 X 0.5 X 2.5D
- M3 X 0.5 X 3D

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 5 x 0.8 - 2.0 D (10 mm) - free running - 100 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. STI thread (Insert thread) is cut and the BaerCoil® insert is screwed in. The thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are essential for optimum force transmission in lightweight constructions. They ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed in a balanced way to the individual threads. Also, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for any pitch and angle errors. BaerCoil® thread inserts not only save time and money, but are also much lighter and more compact than conventional screw connections.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5 |
| Pitch | 0,8 |
| Dimension | M 5 x 0,8 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 10 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the diameter: 2 times 5 mm=10 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 5 is 5 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 5 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 10 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 5,94 mm - 6,80 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 12,80 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 13,60 mm |

### Payment & Security

- Apple Pay

- Google Pay

- Maestro

- Shop Pay

- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 6 x 1.0  - free running - 100 pcs.

* * *

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. With the use of BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are an indispensable component in aviation and vehicle construction. They ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed in a balanced manner over the individual thread turns. Also, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for any pitch and angular errors, so that optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts helps to reduce the carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. Thanks to their versatility and reliability, BaerCoil® thread inserts are now an indispensable component in many industries.

BaerCoil thread inserts can be shortened to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 6 |
| Pitch | 1,0 |
| Dimension | M 6 x 1,0 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 12 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the diameter: 2 times 6 mm=12 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 6 is 6 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing of BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 6 x 1.0  - free running - 100 pcs.

* * *

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. With the use of BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

They ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed in a balanced manner over the individual thread turns. Also, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for any pitch and angular errors, so that optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Especially in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts helps to reduce the carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. Thanks to their versatility and reliability, BaerCoil® thread inserts are now an indispensable component in many industries.

BaerCoil thread inserts can be shortened to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

| Diameter | 6 |
| Pitch | 1,0 |
| Dimension | M 6 x 1,0 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 12 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the diameter: 2 times 6 mm=12 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 6 is 6 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![Technical drawing of BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

- M6 X 1.0 X 1D

- M6 X 1.0 X 2D
- M6 X 1.0 X 2.5D
- M6 X 1.0 X 3D

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M8 X 1.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$16.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m8-x-1-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 8 x 1.25 - 2.0 D (16 mm) - free running - 100 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. With the use of BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

BaerCoil® thread inserts ensure optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread, even in lightweight constructions. Today, they are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They save weight and allow the use of smaller and shorter screw connections.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 8 |
| Pitch | 1,25 |
| Dimension | M 8 x 1,25 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the diameter: 2 times 8 mm=16 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 8 is 8 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 8 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 9,45 mm - 10,35 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 20,38 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 21,63 mm |

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 8 x 1.25 - 2.0 D (16 mm) - free running - 100 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. With the use of BaerCoil® thread inserts, the thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

BaerCoil® thread inserts ensure optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread, even in lightweight constructions. Today, they are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They save weight and allow the use of smaller and shorter screw connections.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 8 |
| Pitch | 1,25 |
| Dimension | M 8 x 1,25 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the diameter: 2 times 8 mm=16 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 8 is 8 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 8 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 16 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 9,45 mm - 10,35 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 20,38 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 21,63 mm |

Length

- Default
- M8 X 1.25 X 1D
- M8 X 1.25 X 1.5D
- M8 X 1.25 X 2D
- M8 X 1.25 X 2.5D
- M8 X 1.25 X 3D

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

length measurement:

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

M10 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 10 x 1.5 - 2.5 D (25 mm) - free running.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long-lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

If you have damaged threads, the BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution - while maintaining the same nominal diameter! By reaming and inserting a new EC thread, your old thread becomes strong and stable again. With the BaerCoil® thread insert, your manufactured thread becomes significantly more stable than the original thread!

BaerCoil® thread inserts are sophisticated design elements that ensure optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread. They compensate for pitch and angular errors and thus distribute static and dynamic work loads evenly over all thread turns. This is particularly important in lightweight constructions where the carrier material is to be reduced. BaerCoil® thread inserts make it possible to use smaller and shorter screw connections. Today, they are already an important component in the aerospace and automotive industries.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 10 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Dimension | M 10 x 1,5 |
| Length | 2,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 25 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.5 D means 2.5 times the diameter: 2.5 times 10 mm=25 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 10 is 10 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 10 |
| Length | 2,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 25 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 11,74 mm - 12,50 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 30,25 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 31,75 mm |

BAERCOIL


## M10 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$16.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 10 x 1.5 - 2.5 D (25 mm) - free running.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long-lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

If you have damaged threads, the BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution - while maintaining the same nominal diameter! By reaming and inserting a new EC thread, your old thread becomes strong and stable again. With the BaerCoil® thread insert, your manufactured thread becomes significantly more stable than the original thread!

BaerCoil® thread inserts are sophisticated design elements that ensure optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread. They compensate for pitch and angular errors and thus distribute static and dynamic work loads evenly over all thread turns. This is particularly important in lightweight constructions where the carrier material is to be reduced. BaerCoil® thread inserts make it possible to use smaller and shorter screw connections. Today, they are already an important component in the aerospace and automotive industries.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 10 |
| Pitch | 1,5 |
| Dimension | M 10 x 1,5 |
| Length | 2,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 25 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.5 D means 2.5 times the diameter: 2.5 times 10 mm=25 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 10 is 10 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 10 |
| Length | 2,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 25 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 11,74 mm - 12,50 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 30,25 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 31,75 mm |

Length

- Default
- M10 X 1.5 X 1D
- M10 X 1.5 X 1.5D
- M10 X 1.5 X 2D
- M10 X 1.5 X 2.5D
- M10 X 1.5 X 3D

Qty.

- Default
- 10

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

M11 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

M12 X 1.25 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$12.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m12-x-1-25-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

M14 X 1.25 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$13.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m14-x-1-25-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

M14 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$18.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m14-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M14 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$18.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- M14 X 2.0 X 1D
- M14 X 2.0 X 1.5D
- M14 X 2.0 X 2D
- M14 X 2.0 X 2.5D
- M14 X 2.0 X 3D

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

M16 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$22.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m16-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay

- Maestro

- Shop Pay

- Visa

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_2930947.jpeg?v=1345795743&width=88)

M20 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$35.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m20-x-1-5-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M20 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$35.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- M20 X 1.5 X 1D
- M20 X 1.5 X 1.5D
- M20 X 1.5 X 2D
- M20 X 1.5 X 2.5D
- M20 X 1.5 X 3D

Qty.

- Default
- 25

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_7598776.jpeg?v=1345796347&width=88)

M20 X 2.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$84.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m20-x-2-5-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## M20 X 2.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$84.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- M20 X 2.5 X 1D
- M20 X 2.5 X 1.5D
- M20 X 2.5 X 2D
- M20 X 2.5 X 2.5D
- M20 X 2.5 X 3D

Qty.

- Default
- 25

M22 X 2.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$143.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m22-x-2-5-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

M24 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$65.00** ~~~~

We ship with DPD

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

length measurement:

\- Recovery of rejected items

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.
