BAERCOIL


## M28 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts

**$60.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- M28 X 1.5 X 1.5D

Qty.

- Default
- 5

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M30 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$34.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m30-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## M33 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

From **$73.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- M33 X 2.0 X 1D
- M33 X 2.0 X 1.5D

- 5

M33 X 3.5 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$31.00** ~~~~

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M36 X 1.5 BaerCoil Inserts

**$113.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m36-x-1-5-baercoil-inserts-helicoil)

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

M36 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts


**$103.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m36-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M36 X 3.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

**$123.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m36-x-3-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil)

M36 X 4.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


From **$42.00** ~~~~

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## M39 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

**$262.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m39-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

M42 X 2.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


**$439.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m42-x-2-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

# **Got a Question?** **Call 01-4730900**

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

M42 X 4.0 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)


**$439.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/m42-x-4-0-baercoil-inserts-helicoil#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

DIN 8140, Toleranz ISO 2 (6H)

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. M 3: 1,5 times 3 = 4,5mm

[Technical data - metric BaerCoil wire thread inserts DIN 8140](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_metric.html)

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## UNC 2 X 56 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$8.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- UNC 2 X 56 X 1D
- UNC 2 X 56 X 1.5D
- UNC 2 X 56 X 2D
- UNC 2 X 56 X 2.5D
- UNC 2 X 56 X 3D

UNC 4 X 40 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$6.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-4-x-40-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_8340387.jpeg?v=1345818219&width=88)

UNC 10 X 24 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$6.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-10-x-24-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNC 10 X 24 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$6.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_6424631.jpeg?v=1345824757&width=88)

UNC 1/4 X 20 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$7.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-1-4-x-20-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

UNC 3/8 X 16 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$16.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-3-8-x-16-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

- Google Pay

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

###### Spirol Pins

We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## UNC 5/8 X 11 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$15.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- UNC 5/8 X 11 X 1D
- UNC 5/8 X 11 X 1.5D
- UNC 5/8 X 11 X 2D
- UNC 5/8 X 11 X 2.5D
- UNC 5/8 X 11 X 3D

Qty.

- Default
- 10
- 50

UNC 3/4 x 10 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$10.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-3-4-x-10-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## UNC 7/8" X 9 X 1.5D BaerCoil Inserts 10Pck

From **$36.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- UNC 7/8 X 9 X 1D
- UNC 7/8 X 9 X 1.5D
- UNC 7/8 X 9 X 2D
- UNC 7/8 X 9 X 2.5D
- UNC 7/8 X 9 X 3D

Qty.

- Default
- 10

UNC 1" X 8 BaerCoil Inserts - 10Pck


From **$0.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc1x8baercoilinserts-10pck#variants)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay

- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## UNC 1.1/8" X 7 BaerCoil Inserts

**$58.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- UNC 1.1/8 X 7 X 1.5D

Qty.

- Default
- 5

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

UNC 1.1/4" X 7 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$61.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-1-1-4-x-7-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BAERCOIL


## UNC 1.3/8" X 6 BaerCoil Inserts

**$99.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

Length

- Default
- UNC 1.3/8" X 6 X 1.5D

Qty.

- Default
- 5

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_9413071.jpeg?v=1345897098&width=88)

UNC 1.1/2" X 6 BaerCoil Inserts


**$124.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unc-1-1-2-x-6-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNC 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNC Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unc.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNF 2 x 64 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$236.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNF 4 X 48 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$5.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts UNF No. 10 x 32 - 1.0 D (4.83 mm) 100 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts provide a long-lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery. The inserts also create load-bearing connections in materials with low shear strength. thread inserts are precise and wear-resistant, holding your screw firmly in place without changing the thread insert. Ideal for repairing stripped or worn threads. wire thread inserts are often used in automotive, electrical, medical, lightweight construction, and aerospace applications.

For thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) for the wire thread insert is cut. Often this thread is also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert).

BaerCoil® thread inserts are perfect for applications where a balanced distribution of forces is required. They can withstand both static and dynamic loads and help save support material.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened with a side cutter or similar, according to the required length.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNF No. 10 x 32 |
| Length | 1,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 4,83 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.0 D means 1 times the diameter: 1 times 4.83 mm=4.83 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF No. 10 is approx. 4.83 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Length | 1,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 4,83 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,227 '' - 0,256 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,299 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,331 '' |

# **Discover why Professionals Prefer BaerCoil over all other Thread Repair Kits**

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unf-10-x-32-baercoil-inserts)

BAERCOIL


## UNF 10 X 32 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$5.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts UNF No. 10 x 32 - 1.0 D (4.83 mm) 100 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts provide a long-lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery. The inserts also create load-bearing connections in materials with low shear strength. thread inserts are precise and wear-resistant, holding your screw firmly in place without changing the thread insert. Ideal for repairing stripped or worn threads. wire thread inserts are often used in automotive, electrical, medical, lightweight construction, and aerospace applications.

For thread repair with wire thread inserts, the thread is drilled out and a new STI thread (screw thread insert) for the wire thread insert is cut. Often this thread is also called STI thread (STI=Screw Thread Insert).

BaerCoil® thread inserts are perfect for applications where a balanced distribution of forces is required. They can withstand both static and dynamic loads and help save support material.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened with a side cutter or similar, according to the required length.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Pitch | 32 |
| Dimension | UNF No. 10 x 32 |
| Length | 1,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 4,83 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.0 D means 1 times the diameter: 1 times 4.83 mm=4.83 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF No. 10 is approx. 4.83 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | No. 10 |
| Length | 1,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 4,83 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 0,227 '' - 0,256 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 0,299 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 0,331 '' |

Length

- Default
- UNF 10 X 32 X 1D
- UNF 10 X 32 X 1.5D
- UNF 10 X 32 X 2D
- UNF 10 X 32 X 2.5D
- UNF 10 X 32 X 3D

Qty.

- Default
- 10

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

View details

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNF 5/16 X 24 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$8.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

UNF 3/8 x 24 BaerCoil Inserts


From **$9.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unf-3-8-x-24-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

### Payment & Security
