- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## UNF 7/16 x 20 BaerCoil Inserts

From **$21.00** ~~~~

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

From **$14.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unf-1-2-x-20-baercoil-inserts#variants)

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

- Apple Pay

- Google Pay

- Maestro

- Shop Pay

- Visa

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

UNF 1.1/8 X 12 BaerCoil Inserts


**$87.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unf-1-1-8-x-12-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

Close

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/products/baercoil_insert_4164521.jpeg?v=1345909689&width=88)

UNF 1.3/8 X 12 BaerCoil Inserts


**$213.00** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/unf-1-3-8-x-12-baercoil-inserts#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts - Standard

Stainless Steel (AISI 304), type: "free running"

length measurement:

1,5 D means 1,5 times thread diameter equals thread lenght, e.g. UNF 1/4: 1,5 times 6,35 (1/4") = 9,525mm

[UNF Wire Thread Inserts - Dimensions](http://www.baercoil.com/en/dimensions_unf.html)

[BaerCoil Instruction for use](http://www.baercoil.com/en/instructions_baercoil.html)

[Technical Information](http://www.baercoil.com/en/baercoil_technical_info.html)

BaerCoil:

\- Thread Repair of damaged or worn-out threads

\- Recovery of rejected items

\- Thread Armour Plating. For material with low shear strenght

eg. aluminium alloys and magnesium alloys.

Due to narrow and exact tolerances the new thread normally is stronger than the original one.

Use in machine-building, electrical, automotive, medical and aerospace industries.

_Please request the prices for large quantity._

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Inserting Tool M 10


**$17.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/baercoilinsertingtoolm10#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Inserting Tool M 10 (and more)

With the manual BaerCoil® installation tool for wire thread inserts you can install the wire thread inserts in your workpiece in a simple and efficient way.

For precise depth limitation, the insertion tool is equipped with a locking ring. In order to be able to precisely control the installation depth of the thread inserts, the locking ring can be loosened and adjusted in height with a simple grub screw.

The locking ring must be fixed so that the tang of the thread insert is in the centre of the groove. Then screw the thread insert into the receiving thread under slight pressure until it is 1/4 - 1/2 turn below the surface. Care must be taken not to turn the insert against the direction of rotation as this may cause the spigot to break off.

The throw-over tool has a 7 mm square drive, i.e. the insertion tool can be driven like a screw tap with a tap wrench or a tool ratchet. In this way, convenient and effort-saving handling during assembly is possible.

In case the thread is deeper than expected, the installation tool can be extended quite easily with our tap extension. This makes it easy to work in deeper areas without having to sacrifice efficiency and precision.

### The hand insertion tool can be used for the following dimensions:

- Metric thread inserts: M 10 x 1.5 & M 10 x 1.25 & M 10 x 1.0 & M 11 x 1.5 & M 11 x 1.25 & M 11 x 1.0
- UNC thread inserts: UNC 7/16 x 14
- UNF thread inserts: UNF 7/16 x 20
- BSW thread inserts: BSW 7/16 x 14
- BSF thread inserts: BSF 7/16 x 18
- G-tube (BSP) thread inserts: G 1/8 x 28
- NPT thread inserts: NPT 1/8 x 27
- Harley thread inserts: Harley 7/16 x 16
- BSC thread inserts: BSC 7/16 x 26
- BSB thread inserts: BSB 7/16 x 26

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 10 |
| Dimension | M 10 |
| Length | 100 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Assembly tools |
| Product type | BaerCoil installation tools |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Direction | Right |

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerCoil Inserting Tool M 10 (and more)

With the manual BaerCoil® installation tool for wire thread inserts you can install the wire thread inserts in your workpiece in a simple and efficient way.

For precise depth limitation, the insertion tool is equipped with a locking ring. In order to be able to precisely control the installation depth of the thread inserts, the locking ring can be loosened and adjusted in height with a simple grub screw.

The locking ring must be fixed so that the tang of the thread insert is in the centre of the groove. Then screw the thread insert into the receiving thread under slight pressure until it is 1/4 - 1/2 turn below the surface. Care must be taken not to turn the insert against the direction of rotation as this may cause the spigot to break off.

The throw-over tool has a 7 mm square drive, i.e. the insertion tool can be driven like a screw tap with a tap wrench or a tool ratchet. In this way, convenient and effort-saving handling during assembly is possible.

In case the thread is deeper than expected, the installation tool can be extended quite easily with our tap extension. This makes it easy to work in deeper areas without having to sacrifice efficiency and precision.

### The hand insertion tool can be used for the following dimensions:

- Metric thread inserts: M 10 x 1.5 & M 10 x 1.25 & M 10 x 1.0 & M 11 x 1.5 & M 11 x 1.25 & M 11 x 1.0

- UNF thread inserts: UNF 7/16 x 20

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

BaerCoil Inserting Tool M 3


**$14.00** ~~~~

[View details](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/baercoilinsertingtoolm3#product-info)

We ship with DPD

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Inserting Tool M 3 (and more)

With the manual BaerCoil® installation tool for wire thread inserts you can install the wire thread inserts in your workpiece in a simple and efficient way.

For precise depth limitation, the insertion tool is equipped with a locking ring. In order to be able to precisely control the installation depth of the thread inserts, the locking ring can be loosened and adjusted in height with a simple grub screw.

The locking ring must be fixed so that the tang of the thread insert is in the centre of the groove. Then screw the thread insert into the receiving thread under slight pressure until it is 1/4 - 1/2 turn below the surface. Care must be taken not to turn the insert against the direction of rotation, as this may cause the spigot to break off.

The throw-over tool has a 5 mm square drive, i.e. the insertion tool can be driven like a screw tap with a tap wrench or a tool ratchet. In this way, convenient and effort-saving handling during assembly is possible.

In case the thread is deeper than expected, the installation tool can be extended quite easily with our tap extension. This makes it easy to work in deeper areas without having to sacrifice efficiency and precision.

### The hand insertion tool can be used for the following dimensions:

- Metric thread inserts: M 3 x 0.5 & M 3.5 x 0.6
- UNC thread inserts: UNC 4 x 40 & UNC 5 x 40 & UNC 6 x 32
- UNF thread inserts: UNF 4 x 48 & UNF 6 x 40
- BSW thread inserts: BSW 1/8 x 40
- BA thread inserts: BA 5

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 3 |
| Dimension | M 3 |
| Length | 100 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts - Assembly tools |
| Product type | BaerCoil installation tools |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Direction | Right |

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

BaerCoil Inserting Tool M 4


**$8.00** ~~~~

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

## Description

BaerCoil Inserting Tool with locking ring

Adapted for: Metric: M 4 x 0.7

UNC: UNC 8 x 32 // UNC 10 x 24

UNF: UNF 8 x 36

BSW: 3/16 x 32

BA: 3 BA // 4 BA

length of inserting tool: 100 mm

Square: 5 mm

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

BaerCoil Inserting Tool with locking ring

Adapted for: Metric: M 6 x 1.0 // M 6 x 0.75

UNC: UNC 1/4 x 20

UNF: UNF 1/4 x 28

BSW: BSW 1/4 x 20

BSF: BSF 9/32 x 26

BA: BA 0

UNEF: UNEF 1/4 x 32

Harley: Harley 1/4 x 24

BSB: BSB 1/4 x 26

length of inserting tool: 100 mm

Square: 5 mm

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

M5 X 0.8 BaerCoil Inserts (Helicoil Type)

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts M 5 x 0.8 - 2.0 D (10 mm) - free running - 100 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the perfect solution for your thread repair needs! These inserts provide a long lasting and powerful thread connection and scrap recovery.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. STI thread (Insert thread) is cut and the BaerCoil® insert is screwed in. The thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are essential for optimum force transmission in lightweight constructions. They ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed in a balanced way to the individual threads. Also, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for any pitch and angle errors. BaerCoil® thread inserts not only save time and money, but are also much lighter and more compact than conventional screw connections.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 5 |
| Pitch | 0,8 |
| Dimension | M 5 x 0,8 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 10 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 2.0 D means 2 times the diameter: 2 times 5 mm=10 mm<br>The nominal diameter for M 5 is 5 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | M: Metric ISO standard thread according to DIN 13 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 5 |
| Length | 2,0 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 10 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 5,94 mm - 6,80 mm |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 12,80 mm |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 13,60 mm |

### Payment & Security

Payment methods

- American Express
- Apple Pay
- Bancontact
- Google Pay
- iDEAL
- Maestro
- Mastercard
- Shop Pay
- Union Pay
- Visa

Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store credit card details nor have access to your credit card information.

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

1" 1/8 X 12 UNF X 1.5D BAERCOIL INSERTS 5 PACK

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts UNF 1.1/8“ x 12 - 1.5 D (42.86 mm) - free running - 5 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are made of high-quality materials wire thread inserts. BaerCoil® thread inserts provide a durable and powerful threaded connection and scrap recovery in the thread repair. The inserts also create load-bearing connections in materials with low shear strength. thread inserts are precise and wear-resistant, holding your screw firmly in place without changing the thread insert. Ideal for repairing stripped or worn threads. wire thread inserts are commonly used in automotive, electrical, medical, lightweight construction, and aerospace applications.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads and that at the same time nominal diameter. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the manufactured thread is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed in a balanced way to the individual thread turns. Also, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for any pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Particularly in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to reduce the carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. Today, they are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1.1/8" |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNF 1.1/8" x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 42,86 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 28.58 mm=42.86 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1.1/8" is approx. 28.58 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1.1/8" |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 42,86 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 1,222 '' - 1,334 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,979 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 2,062 '' |

# **Discover why Professionals Prefer BaerCoil over all other Thread Repair Kits**

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/118x12unfx15dbaercoilinserts5pack)

BAERCOIL


## 1" 1/8 X 12 UNF X 1.5D BAERCOIL INSERTS 5 PACK

**$170.00** ~~~~

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts UNF 1.1/8“ x 12 - 1.5 D (42.86 mm) - free running - 5 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are made of high-quality materials wire thread inserts. BaerCoil® thread inserts provide a durable and powerful threaded connection and scrap recovery in the thread repair. The inserts also create load-bearing connections in materials with low shear strength. thread inserts are precise and wear-resistant, holding your screw firmly in place without changing the thread insert. Ideal for repairing stripped or worn threads. wire thread inserts are commonly used in automotive, electrical, medical, lightweight construction, and aerospace applications.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads and that at the same time nominal diameter. With BaerCoil® thread inserts, the manufactured thread is significantly more stable than the original thread.

Our thread inserts ensure that both static and dynamic work loads are distributed in a balanced way to the individual thread turns. Also, the flexibility of the thread inserts compensates for any pitch and angular errors, so that optimum force transmission from the bolt to the nut thread is achieved. Particularly in lightweight constructions, BaerCoil® thread inserts help to reduce the carrier material and to use smaller or shorter screw connections. Today, they are already an important component in aviation and vehicle construction. They significantly save material and contribute to the conservation of resources.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened according to the required length with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1.1/8" |
| Pitch | 12 |
| Dimension | UNF 1.1/8" x 12 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 42,86 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the diameter: 1.5 times 28.58 mm=42.86 mm<br>The nominal diameter for UNF 1.1/8" is approx. 28.58 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | UNF: American Fine Unified National thread according to ANSI B1.1 |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1.1/8" |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 42,86 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 1,222 '' - 1,334 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,979 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 2,062 '' |

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil Wire Thread Inserts G (BSP) 1“ x 11 - 1.5 D (38.1 mm) - free running - 5 pcs.

BaerCoil® thread inserts are the best solution for all your repair needs! With them you can create long-lasting and powerful connections. These inserts also ensure that you have no waste and recycle everything. The inserts are precise and wear resistant - your screw will stay firmly in place without the thread insert slipping.

The BaerCoil® thread insert is the perfect solution for damaged threads. STI thread (screw thread insert) is cut and the BaerCoil® insert is screwed in. The thread produced is significantly stronger than the original thread.

BaerCoil® thread inserts ensure optimum power transmission from the bolt to the nut thread - even in lightweight constructions. Due to their flexibility, they can compensate for pitch and angle errors and thus guarantee optimum force transmission. BaerCoil® thread inserts are already important components in the aerospace and automotive industries and help to reduce carrier material and use smaller, shorter bolted joints.

BaerCoil® thread inserts can be shortened, according to the required length, with a side cutter or similar.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1" |
| Pitch | 11 |
| Dimension | G (BSP) 1" x 11 |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| Thread length calculation | 1.5 D means 1.5 times the calculation diameter: 1.5 times 25.4 mm=38.1 mm<br>The nominal diameter for G (BSP) 1" is approx. 33.25 mm, but according to the standard the length is calculated with the diameter of 25.4 mm for calculation purposes |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Wire thread inserts |
| Product type | BaerCoil wire thread inserts |
| Thread standard | G (BSP): British Standard Pipe Thread according to DIN ISO 228 - Cylindrical pipe thread |
| Direction | Right |
| Type | free running |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | >1400 N/mm² |
| Material | Stainless Steel V2A (AISI 304, X5CrNi18-10, Material No.: 1.4301) |
| Temperature resistance | 315°C long-term<br>425°C short-term |

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and thread reinforcement

### Technical drawing

![](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/53/0d/f3/BaerCoil_Gewindeeinsatz_Zeichnung.svg)

| Diameter | 1" |
| Length | 1,5 D |
| T (Length when installed) | 38,1 mm |
| F (Min. - Max. outside diameter of thread insert) | 1,416 '' - 1,543 '' |
| P (depth) | The thread insert must sit 1/4 - 1/2 turns below the surface |
| B (thread depth with chamfer) | 1,819 '' |
| D (minimum depth of the core hole, without tip) | 1,910 '' |

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

Product information

## BaerCoil HSSG Short Machine Tap M 24 x 3.0 STI (oversized for wire thread inserts)

* * *

BaerCoil® screw tap are mainly used for thread repair or thread reinforcement in connection with wire thread inserts. With this BaerCoil® short machine tap, a finished thread with oversize can be cut in one operation as a holding thread for wire thread inserts of dimension M 24 x 3.0. Precise internal thread can thus be cut time-savingly by hand or semi-professionally by machine.

The holding thread for M 24 x 3.0 thread inserts is also called STI thread (screw thread insert) or STI thread (in English Screw Thread Insert) and has an oversize so that the normal initial thread M 24 x 3.0 is restored after installation of the thread insert.

Compared to the machine tap, the short machine tap is equipped with a short shank. This allows internal thread to be cut by hand without jamming and operated with tap wrenches, ratchets or other holding tools with square drive. The thread can be cut in a pre-drilled core hole. Pre-machining with a taper tap (No. 1) or intermediate tap (No. 2) is not necessary.

With the short chamfer and the straight flutes, the chip is mainly absorbed by the flutes and is not removed during cutting. To prevent the chips from sticking, it is recommended to remove the chips from the grooves with a brush, compressed air or similar after each thread cutting. This form of gating makes the screw tap reliable and universally applicable for both through holes and blind holes.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 24 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 1,098 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 27,9 |
| Pitch | 3,0 |
| Pitch in mm | 3 |
| Dimension | M 24 x 3,0 EG/STI |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Screw taps<br>Wire thread inserts - Taps |
| Product type | BaerCoil screw taps |
| Thread standard | M EG/STI: Metric ISO standard thread for wire thread inserts according to DIN 8140-2 |
| Tolerance | ISO2/6H mod. (ISO1/4H) |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | Factory standard |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | up to 800 N/mm² \| 22.2 HRC |
| Material | HSSG bright |

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## BaerCoil HSSG Short Machine Tap M 24 x 3.0 STI (oversized for wire thread inserts)

* * *

BaerCoil® screw tap are mainly used for thread repair or thread reinforcement in connection with wire thread inserts. With this BaerCoil® short machine tap, a finished thread with oversize can be cut in one operation as a holding thread for wire thread inserts of dimension M 24 x 3.0. Precise internal thread can thus be cut time-savingly by hand or semi-professionally by machine.

The holding thread for M 24 x 3.0 thread inserts is also called STI thread (screw thread insert) or STI thread (in English Screw Thread Insert) and has an oversize so that the normal initial thread M 24 x 3.0 is restored after installation of the thread insert.

Compared to the machine tap, the short machine tap is equipped with a short shank. This allows internal thread to be cut by hand without jamming and operated with tap wrenches, ratchets or other holding tools with square drive. The thread can be cut in a pre-drilled core hole. Pre-machining with a taper tap (No. 1) or intermediate tap (No. 2) is not necessary.

With the short chamfer and the straight flutes, the chip is mainly absorbed by the flutes and is not removed during cutting. To prevent the chips from sticking, it is recommended to remove the chips from the grooves with a brush, compressed air or similar after each thread cutting. This form of gating makes the screw tap reliable and universally applicable for both through holes and blind holes.

## Description

## BaerCoil HSSG Short Machine Tap BSF 1/4 x 26 STI (oversized for wire thread inserts)

* * *

BaerCoil® screw tap are mainly used for thread repair or thread reinforcement in connection with wire thread inserts. With this BaerCoil® short machine tap, a finished thread with oversize can be cut in one operation as a holding thread for wire thread inserts of dimension BSF 1/4 x 26. Precise internal thread can thus be cut time-savingly by hand or semi-professionally by machine.

The holding thread for BSF 1/4 x 26 thread inserts is also called STI thread (screw thread insert) or STI thread (in English Screw Thread Insert) and has an oversize so that the normal starting thread BSF 1/4 x 26 is restored after installation of the thread insert.

Compared to the machine tap, the short machine tap has a short shank. This allows internal thread to be cut by hand without jamming and operated with tap wrenches, ratchets or other holding tools with square drive. The thread can be cut in a pre-drilled core hole. Pre-machining with a taper tap (No. 1) or intermediate tap (No. 2) is not necessary.

With the short chamfer and the straight flutes, the chip is mainly absorbed by the flutes and is not removed during cutting. To prevent the chips from sticking, it is recommended to remove the chips from the grooves with a brush, compressed air or similar after each thread cutting. This form of gating makes the screw tap reliable and universally applicable for both through holes and blind holes.

### Dimensions

| Diameter | 1/4 |
| Nominal diameter in inches | 0,296 |
| Nominal diameter in mm | 7,51 |
| Pitch | 26 |
| Pitch in mm | 0,977 |
| Dimension | BSF 1/4 x 26 EG/STI |
| Square | 6,30 mm |

### Characteristics

| Product group | Screw taps<br>Wire thread inserts - Taps |
| Product type | BaerCoil screw taps |
| Thread standard | BSF EG/STI: British Whitworth fine thread for wire thread inserts |
| Direction | Right |
| Standard | Factory standard |
| Tensile strength at room temperature | up to 800 N/mm² \| 22.2 HRC |
| Material | HSSG bright |

6.6 mm

![Schematic representation of Bild Lochtyp](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/19/52/9d/durchgangsloch_und_sackloch.svg)

**Hole type**

Through hole and blind hole up to 2 x D

![Schematic representation of Bild Form](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/3f/1d/45/gewindebohrer_gerade_nuten.svg)

**Form / Geometry**

Form D straight fluted

![Schematic representation of Bild Anschnitt](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/59/5d/26/gewindebohrer_anschnitt.svg)

**Chamfer**

3.5-5 threads

![Schematic representation of Bild Spanabfuhr](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/bd/e2/8a/spanfluss_gerade_nuten.svg)

**Chip removal**

Rarely occurs. Chips remain in flutes.

![Schematic representation of Bild Kühlung](https://media.baer.tools/media/vector/41/a7/9a/gewindebohrer_aussenkuehlung.svg)

**Cooling**

External cooling and lubrication

HSSG bright

**Tensile strength at room temperature**

up to 800 N/mm² \| 22.2 HRC

### Applications

All normal uses for thread repair and for thread reinforcement of through-hole and blind-hole threads.

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.
